actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.
Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment without recommendation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to provide relief for Hoar Construction, Inc. of Birmingham, Alabama to settle certain claims filed against the Small Business Administration.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named business in full satisfaction of claims against the Small Business Administration for losses resulting from failure to guarantee a performance and payment bond.

titles.title: A bill to provide relief for Hoar Construction, Inc. of Birmingham, Alabama to settle certain claims filed against the Small Business Administration.
